Count number bank to receive payments
This application offers a referral program based exclusively on real and verifiable purchases of products or services provided by companies registered on the platform.

Monetary rewards are generated only when a referred user effectively purchases a product or service available in the application. No payments are made for simply registering referrals or for the number of invited users. Registering referrals does not guarantee income.
Example: A user may have multiple registered referrals; however, if none of them purchase a product or service offered by an affiliated company, no payment will be generated.

This application is not a pyramid, multi-level, or investment scheme. No guaranteed income is promised. Earnings depend exclusively on real commercial transactions and not on the growth of a user network. No payments or investments are required to participate.

All rewards are subject to verification and validation processes. The platform reserves the right to reject or cancel payments that do not meet the established conditions. Any fraudulent or abusive use of the referral system may result in account suspension or termination.

To receive payments, the user must provide a valid bank account in their own name. The user is solely responsible for ensuring that the provided personal and banking information is accurate, complete, and up to date.
The platform is not responsible for failed payments, delays, or losses caused by incorrect or false information provided by the user. Using the application implies acceptance of these policies.
